name: Empire Store Ignition Intake
description: Captures a prospect's brand, product, and readiness information, routes to review, and, if approved, triggers store creation workflows.
execution_steps: Capture intake data from the Empire Store Ignition application form.
Score the lead based on readiness, clarity of offer, and revenue goals.
Generate a short intake summary and recommendation for the sales/operator team.
Route the intake to the Sales/Commerce Council for review.
If approved, create a store.create_shopify_store (or WooCommerce) workflow with mapped inputs.
Notify the team and prospect about next steps and timelines.
